content: pikachu pokemon crochet tutorial video by amigurumipianosound materials 4 ply worsted weight yarn i used local brand named eagle 3 5mm hook i used 6/0 japanese tulip hook abbreviation chain- chain st - stitch single_crochet- single_crochet sl- slip_stitch double_crochet - double_crochet half_double_crochet - half_double_crochet decrease- decrease single_crochet - repeat instruction in parenthesis free tutorial here youtube https //youtu be/ta29yuygyiy blogger https //amigurumipianosound blogspot co uk/2016/09/free-pikachu-crochet-tutorial-and html enjoy
